name: Deception I II
description:
A kafkaesque visual novel about being trapped and being deceived.

Inspired by Kafka and my experimental writings.

Link for writings in Mandarin: https://jumoyang.wordpress.com/2020/06/20/deceived/

Music used: Morning Passages by Phlip Glass
